evoter.server.http.request

Class SessionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • evoter.server.http.request.SessionService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISessionService

    @Service
@Transactional
@TransactionConfiguration(defaultRollback=true)
public class SessionService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISessionService
    Process all Session requests sent by client applications
    This class is an implementation of ISessionService
    Author:
    btdiem

      • doGetAll

        @Rollback(value=false)
public java.lang.Object doGetAll(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Description copied from interface: ISessionService
        This method will select all Session of a given subject of parameter request
        There are two kind of requests. One is sent by teacher user and the other is sent by student user
        Teacher user request will receive all sessions created by him
        Student user request will receive all sessions invited
        This method is called when receiving URIRequest.GET_ALL_SESSION
        Specified by:
        doGetAll in interface ISessionService
        Parameters:
        parameters - contains :
        • SessionDAO.SUBJECT_ID UserDAO.USER_KEY
        Returns:
        Session.toJSON() array if subject has session. Otherwise, returning an empty array

      • doView

        @Rollback(value=false)
public java.lang.Object doView(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Description copied from interface: ISessionService
        Get a Session that has the same sessionID in parameter request
        This method is called when receiving URIRequest.VIEW_QUESTION
        Specified by:
        doView in interface ISessionService
        Parameters:
        parameters - request parameter map contains
        SessionDAO.ID
        UserDAO.USER_KEY
        Returns:
        Session.toJSON() if session is found otherwise, returning an empty array

      • doActive

        public java.lang.Object doActive(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Description copied from interface: ISessionService

        Returns:
        success message if there is no exception
        Otherwise, @return failure message
        this method is called when receiving URIRequest.ACTIVE_SESSION

      • doCreate

        public java.lang.Object doCreate(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Description copied from interface: ISessionService
        Create a new Session object from values of parameter request
        Add new Session to session table
        Add a new SessionUser record to session_user table
        Add two questions:excited and difficult to calculate real time statistics
        Specified by:
        doCreate in interface ISessionService
        Parameters:
        parameters - contains
        • SessionDAO.CREATION_DATE
        SessionDAO.IS_ACTIVE
        SessionDAO.NAME
        SessionDAO.SUBJECT_ID
        UserDAO.USER_KEY
        Returns:
        success message if there is no exception.
        Otherwise, @return a failure message
        This method is called when receiving URIRequest.CREATE_SESSION

      • createQuestion

        public void createQuestion(java.lang.String questionText,
                  long sessionId,
                  long userId)
        Create a specific Question for this session
        Create an slider answer with default value is 10 for this question
        Parameters:
        questionText - question content
        sessionId - the current active session
        userId - user creates session

      • updateStatus

        public java.lang.Object updateStatus(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters,
                            boolean isActive)
        Update the session status when session changes from active to inactive or
        from inactive to active
        Parameters:
        parameters - contains:
        • SessionDAO.ID UserDAO.USER_KEY
        isActive - true if the current session is activated. False if the current value is in-activated

        @Rollback(value=false)
public java.lang.Object doGetStudentsOfSession(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Description copied from interface: ISessionService
